titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (CONTRIBUTING CONDITION) - Description

body.p: DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (CONTRIBUTING CONDITION) is the same as attribute PERSON OBSERVATION TEXT STRING .

DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (CONTRIBUTING CONDITION) is the 'other significant conditions contributing to the death but not related to the disease or condition causing it' as recorded on the death certificate.
